description: The Senate of Canada is seenking a contract for the provision of janitorial supplies and services, the contract was published in 2023, and data closing date was 2023-04-10. This contract will provide a total of two years , then an option for an additional three one-year extensions and the expected start date is 2023-06-01 and expected end date is 2023-05-31. The contract will  be managed by Remy Duerto, Senior Procurement Advisor at the Senate. The contact information is Proc-Appr@sen.parl.gc.ca
